item.description:
Learn how to manage conflict for quicker and sustaining resolution.Herb will talk about how stress relates to conflict, how to manage anger, and practical options to negotiate needs related to conflict. The method of Non-Violent Communication skills will be emphasized.

Herb Pearce has been teaching Conflict Resolution for many years. He is a therapist, personal coach and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for living

www.herbpearce.com


Optional fabulous macrobiotic meal for $20 including dessert from 7 to 8:30pm. Call 1 day in advance for reservations.

Workshop from 8:30-10pm, $15-30 sliding scale.

To register: Call Herb Pearce 781 648 3737, or email herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: 1 mile from Newton Marriott, near the Mass. Pike, pass bridge over Pike, left on Robinwood, rt. on Crescent
item.name: Conflict Resolution
